papers.title: Classification of mental task from EEG data using neural networks based on particle swarm optimization.
papers.description: This paper try to use a modern GAN algorithm for find a relation between eeg signals and image generated from there (Encoder from EEG signals to discriminate between visual object categories). Virtually they tried to 'read the mind'.
